attacks.name: Poison Sound Wave
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Strength in Numbers
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Zubat, Golbat, and Crobat on your bench.
